imdb.plot outline: International Award winning format Make Me A Success is an exciting Enterprise Challenge TV reality show, where young adults from all walks of life and all backgrounds, whether unemployed, disadvantaged, young graduates, innovators, budding entrepreneurs, or facing hardship, are trained in different industries, then compete in nail biting challenges to win the top cash prize to set up their own business, or pay for further education for career building jobs. We see them transform on their incredible journey to success and discover who's got what it takes to be a big entrepreneur. The road to wealth starts with a single step. Make Me A Success is educational, motivational, and makes great entertaining television. A very interactive show, with audience participation, inspiring millions of young people to become successful adults, while getting an insight into different industries, learning something meaningful about the world of business.
imdb.title: Make Me a Success Enterprise Challenge
akas: Make Me a Success Enterprise Challenge (United Kingdom)
plot: Make me a success is survival of the talented, a business makeover with twists. A group of Young adults with big dreams compete to win money to start a business.::Fathia Plange

We see them transform on their incredible journey to success and discover who's got what it takes to be a big entrepreneur. The road to wealth starts with a single step. Make Me A Success is educational, motivational, and makes great entertaining television. A very interactive show, with audience participation, inspiring millions of young people to become successful adults, while getting an insight into different industries, learning something meaningful about the world of business.::Fathia Plange
